message: Let's start fair. I'll take 90% and you get 10%.  We can negotiate more if you'd like.
Let's be reasonable, I'll take a bit more than half and leave you with a decent share. It's in our best interest to reach an agreement.

I appreciate your offer, but I think it's fair to split the remaining value more evenly. Let's go with 55/45, I'll take the larger share this time.  We can continue to work this out, but we need to be mindful of the decreasing value of our money.
